CustomField.formula: IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c = 0, "Today", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c <= 30, "Last 30 Days", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c <= 60, "Last 60 Days", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c <= 90, "Last 90 Days", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c <= 180, "Last 180 Days", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c <= 360, "Last 360 Days", IF(TODAY() - Check_in_Date__c > 360, "Over a year", "No Activity" )))))))
CustomField.label: Days Since Last Check-In
